Class org.apache.hadoop.hdfs.client.HdfsAdmin

Added Methods
void createEncryptionZone(Path, String, EnumSet) Create an encryption zone rooted at an empty existing directory using the specified encryption key.
Collection getAllStoragePolicies() Retrieve all the storage policies supported by HDFS file system.
ErasureCodingPolicy[] getErasureCodingPolicies() Get the Erasure coding policies supported.
ErasureCodingPolicy getErasureCodingPolicy(Path) Get the erasure coding policy information for the specified path
BlockStoragePolicySpi getStoragePolicy(Path) Query the effective storage policy ID for the given file or directory.
void provisionEncryptionZoneTrash(Path) Provision a trash directory for a given encryption zone.
void setErasureCodingPolicy(Path, ErasureCodingPolicy) Set the source path to the specified erasure coding policy.
void unsetStoragePolicy(Path) Unset the storage policy set for a given file or directory.
